quotes.author: Naval
quotes.quote: The modern mental illness is anxiety.

quotes.author: Naval
quotes.quote: Some of the most creative and productive people I have ever met work in multi-week bursts and then have weeks where they just idle with little done. It's the nature of the human animal.

quotes.author: Naval
quotes.quote: If you cannot decide, the answer is no.

quotes.author: Naval
quotes.quote: One of the most damaging and widespread social beliefs is the idea that most adults are incapable of learning new skills.
